UBER PARTNERS

invites drivers with their own cars!

UBER is a dynamically developing company. Today it holds the first place among the taxi companies. The company is totally transparent, and you can control all the processes in your personal account. Our bonus system gives you bonus points for peak time, in addition to your bonuses for taking orders.

We are one of the partners and we have proven ourselves to be one of the best teams in Moscow. Our drivers earn over 80,000-120,000 a month.

Advantages

8 reasons to start cooperating with us

No cash, all payments are made automatically

The price of the trip is paid by the passenger with a connected credit card, i.e. you do not carry any risks due to having cash on you - neither the passenger, nor the driver. You also do not have to look for change in your pockets.

High income with guaranteed payments

We pay salary to the driver's personal credit card! You do not have to arrange a company and pay taxes, submit a declaration, pay for accounting services and maintain a bank account.

Convenient, transparent, and easy to join

We connect you remotely and for free, you do not need to come to us! You send us copies of documents, we register you and send data for connection, and in 1–2 days you can start working!

Support 24/7

In Uber we have a 24/7 support for the drivers via email. If something is unclear, you can always ask a question via an online-consultation.

Commission 8% + BONUSES

We have a minimum commission and we pay bonuses for each trip, some of our competitors leave bonuses for themselves. We work honestly and drivers earn more with us!

Convenient work hours, no schedules

You just press the "enter line" button to start working. When you decide to finish, press "exit line". You can earn extra money only in the morning, in the evening, on weekends or holidays!

Always lots of orders

The application shows where there are the most orders at the moment, and where the increased tariffs apply. You will not have downtime or idle runs. Our passengers are always pleasant and absolutely conflict-free people who are pleasant to carry.

Without checkerboards or stickers

You do not have to change the color, install a checkerboard on your car or put stickers upon it.

Opportunities
conditions and requirements

CONDITIONS: with your own car:

  • We connect you to the UBER system at 10%.
  • No start payments 0%!
  • We can connect you remotely, you do not have to visit our office
  • You do not have to be an Individual Entrepreneur
  • Orders are distributed to the nearest drivers, irrespectively of their rating
  • Only cashless payments
  • We transfer money to the driver's card or pay it in cash in the office
You can earn 7000-12000 RUR a day + bonus 3000 RUR

CONDITIONS: with a company car:

  • We provide cars without collateral
  • No daily lease payments
  • On Wednesdays, Fridays, and Saturdays, you work for the company, and on the other days you work for yourself

REQUIREMENTS:

  • No ads on your car
  • Your car must not be yellow or with yellow license plate
  • No older than 3 years
  • Driving experience of at least 3 years
  • Mobile device with Androide 4.0 or higher

DOCUMENTS:

  • Driver's License (2 sides)
  • Passport (first page)
  • Maintenance certificate
  • License (if any)
  • Phone number
  • Card number for payment (please state in your email)
